posts.post_content: Go ahead, just *try* plopping this guy on the table next to [Venser, the Sojourner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Venser, the Sojourner) or [Master Transmuter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Master Transmuter) in a large multiplayer game. posts.post_content:
It's a shame there are so many ways of getting all 5 mana without using basic lands these days. Unless you're playing a large multiplayer game with all kinds of different decks, you won't ever really see this guy blow up 5 basics that aren't your own. And then you just \*\*\*ed off 3 other people who decide to gang up on you and take you out in one rotation.   
  
Granted, it is really fun to catch a prismatic omen deck with its pants down with this guy.

Posted By: Lyoncet (6/27/2011 9:09:43 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Remember it specifies one land of each basic land TYPE, not five basic lands. He does in fact destroy dual lands ([Plateau](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plateau), [Temple Garden](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Temple Garden), [Volcanic Island](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Island), [Watery Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Watery Grave), etc) as well.
posts.html:
Remember it specifies one land of each basic land TYPE, not five basic lands. He does in fact destroy dual lands (Plateau, Temple Garden, Volcanic Island, Watery Grave, etc) as well.
